project.title: Safe Handling of Chemicals (SHOC)
project.description:
This module aims to bring awareness on safe handling of chemicals at workplace.
By the end of this module, you will be able to: - describe Malaysian statutory requirements related to chemicals. - identify hazardous chemicals and their effects. - recognise safe work practise in order to inculcate HSE culture in the workplace.
Content Owner: Group Health, Safety, Security & Environment (GHSSE) Duration: 60 minutes Assessment: 10 questions Pass percentage: 80% and above
If you encounter any difficulties to access this eLearning, kindly contact PETRONAS Contact Center for assistance.
